channel.title: Knowledge-Base on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Knowledge-Base on Arrans github.io

item.title: logseq/logseq
item.description: A privacy-first, open-source platform for knowledge management and collaboration. Download link: http://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases. roadmap: https://discuss.logseq.com/t/logseq-product-roadmap/34267

item.title: toeverything/AFFiNE
item.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [É™â€˜fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.

item.title: siyuan-note/siyuan
item.description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

item.title: lobehub/lobe-chat
item.description: ðŸ¤¯ LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

item.title: docmost/docmost
item.description: Docmost is an open-source collaborative wiki and documentation software. It is an open-source alternative to Confluence and Notion.

item.title: suitenumerique/docs
item.description: A collaborative note taking, wiki and documentation platform that scales. Built with Django and React.

item.title: brufdev/many-notes
item.description: Markdown note-taking web application designed for simplicity
